name: SHAKE IT UP! Dice
description:
SHAKE IT UP! Dice is a new multiplayer dice game that’s FREE for everyone!

SHAKE IT UP! Dice is an incredibly fun new social game designed to bring together family and friends. The game is perfect for fans of dice, card, and board games.

Here’s how it works:

- Roll the dice up to three (3) times
- Instead of numbers, the dice have card faces on them
- The player with the higher card hand wins! (Don’t worry--it’s easy and we teach you along the way)

The Ultimate Social Game:

- Cards and dice combined for everyone
- Challenge your friends and family
- Compete with random opponents from around the world
- Create a list of Game Friends and square off for the best record

With Full Solo Play, Too:

- Sharpen your skill as you learn to defeat three levels of challenges!
- Our AI bots play back instantly
- Collect achievements and trophies as you work toward new rewards

And You Know There’s More:

- Finish games to collect points and level-up
- Collect achievements to progress faster
- Earn hearts which you can use for extra rolls

Dive into the Nitty-Gritty:

Our nine special dice have 54 total sides and contain every playing card from a standard deck of cards… plus two Wild cards! The card faces are specifically arranged on the dice so that it’s possible to achieve every four-of-a-kind, every Straight Flush, and every Royal Flush.

If you love Yahtzee, Farkle, Kismet, Poker Dice, and other dice games, then you’ll love Shake It Up! Dice. And if you play poker, Texas Hold ‘Em, rummy, and other card games, then you’ll have a blast with this new game, which offers a fun and original way to stay connected with your friends and family whether you’re together, apart, and on the go!

Download SHAKE IT UP! Dice today, and let’s roll!
